name: Lenine
description: '''Lenine''', artist name of '''Osvaldo Lenine Macedo Pimentel''' (born 2 February 1959), is a Brazilian singer-songwriter from [[Recife]], Pernambuco. Between the years of 2002 and 2018, he has earned a total of seven [[Latin Grammy Awards]], (including the 2005 awards for "Best Brazilian Contemporary Album" and "Best Brazilian Song").
